WORDS: Hi, I'm Brenda. and welcome to Sweet Tooth Bakery
Before we get started. Please Tell me you name.
I am glad that you came because I really need your help.
I am catering a big birthday party and need you to collect 30 desserts before time runs out
But be careful. You will lose points if you select food items that are not desserts. You have 60 seconds!
You're Finished! Thanks for all your help. I am now ready for the party. I look forward to seeing you next time! Good Bye!
OH NO! You didn't collect enough desserts for the party. Now the Party is Ruined. Good Bye!
OH NO! You didn't collect enough desserts for the party. Now the Party is Ruined. Good Bye!
